codeSystems.name: DateOfDeathDeterminationMethodsVS
codeSystems.title: Date of Death Determination Methods Value Set
codeSystems.description:
Date of Death Determination Methods Value Set. The method of date of death determination is not used for the Death Record submission process.
The binding to this value set is included for compatibility with the Medicolegal Death Investigation ([MDI](https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-mdi-ig/)) Implementation Guide.  The valueset only
includes the values used by MDI, but is bound [extensibly](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/terminologies.html#extensible).  If a jurisdiction chooses to use this field, and requires
additional values (e.g., 'presumed'), these values can be used while remaining in full conformance with the VRDR IG.

codeSystems.name: DeathCertificationEventMaxVS
codeSystems.title: Event Code for Death Certificate Composition - Max
codeSystems.description: The maximum valueset for Event.code for Death Certificate Composition.  Includes an inactive but valid code used in STU2

codeSystems.name: DeathCertificationEventVS
codeSystems.title: Event Code for Death Certificate Composition
codeSystems.description: The code used for Event.code for the Death Certificate Composition

codeSystems.name: DeathPregnancyStatusVS
codeSystems.title: Death Pregnancy Status ValueSet
codeSystems.description: A set of codes that reflect whether the decedent was pregnant at or around the time of death. Based on [Pregnancy Status (NCHS)[2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.6003]](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?oid=2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.6003).

codeSystems.name: EditBypass01VS
codeSystems.title: Edit Bypass 01
codeSystems.description: A subset of code values (0 and 1) use to indicate the outcome of data validation assessment for unusual data values.

codeSystems.name: EditBypass012VS
codeSystems.title: Edit Bypass 012
codeSystems.description: A subset of code values (0, 1, and 2) use to indicate the outcome of data validation assessment for unusual data values.

codeSystems.name: EditBypass0124VS
codeSystems.title: Edit Bypass 0124
codeSystems.description: A subset of code values (0, 1, 2, and 4) use to indicate the outcome of data validation assessment for unusual data values.

codeSystems.description:

codeSystems.name: PlaceOfInjuryOtherVS
codeSystems.title: Place of Injury - Other ValueSet
codeSystems.description: Place of Injury from NCHS SuperMicar Format.  This provides additional detail when the TRX code is 'Other'.

codeSystems.name: PlaceOfInjuryVS
codeSystems.title: Place of Injury ValueSet
codeSystems.description:
Place of Injury from NCHS TRX Format.  THis contains all of the codes from https://loinc.org/LL1051-3/ except for LA14087-3 (Public Institution).

Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-PlaceOfInjuryCM.html).

codeSystems.name: ReplaceStatusVS
codeSystems.title: Replacement Status ValueSet
codeSystems.description:
Replacement Status Value Set.  NCHS will not process original or update submissions flagged 'updated_notforNCHS'.

Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-ReplaceStatusCM.html).
